
```{r, eval=F}
# make a scatterplot from the mtcars dataset
mtcars %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=wt, y=mpg)) + # selects the columns to use
    geom_point()         # adds the points to the plot



# the sample plot, but this time ommitting x= and y=
# these are implicit in the order of wt and mpg.
# the x axis comes first
mtcars %>%
  ggplot(aes(wt, mpg)) +
    geom_point()         

```
